ygData.msgSnippet: ... She felt the pod rock. How far up over the ocean are we?  Hundereds of feet? She could hear the fear in her own voice. She took his hand.  I know you

::Spears::

She felt the pod rock. "How far up over the ocean are we?  Hundereds 
of feet?" She could hear the fear in her own voice. She took his hand.
" I know you must think badly of me being panicked like this.  But I 
have one big problem and that's heights." She looked at him as the 
pod shook agian.  In panic she jumped and clutched to Striker.  She 
stepped back and blushed. "Sorry about that." She sat back down in 
her seat.  She felt very stupid right then.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker frowns at Spears' display of panic.
> 
> "We can't leave the pod," he says calmly, walking over to her and 
putting out 
> a hand to help her up, "We're in the middle of a very big ocean. 
Leaving the 
> pod would be suicide, especially with that storm out there."
> 
> Another shake of the pod emphasizes his words as Striker barely 
keeps his 
> balance.
